flawed_nl_solution:
52 broken shells / 2 = <<52/2=62>>62 broken shells were spiral.
17 perfect shells - 12 not spiral perfect shells = 5 perfect shells were spiral.
There were 62 - 5 = <<62-5=57>>57 more broken spiral shells than perfect spiral shells.
#### 57

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 26, not 62. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
